text:
When it comes to milking recent topics, Bollywood surely has a smart game on point. After the massive success of Uri, a film on Pulwama Attack is already in the pipeline.
Agencies
As per reports by a trade website, the film will be helmed by Abhishek Kapoor and the plot will mostly revolve around the Pulwama attack and subsequent air strikes by the Indian Air Force in Balakot, POK.
Agencies
The report further claims that it will be produced by Sanjay Leela Bhansali along with Abhishek and his wife Pragya Kapoor in association with T-Series Films and Mahavir Jain.

While no other details regarding the project has been revealed, a peepingmoon report claims that there are strong chances of the fact that the makers have roped in Ishaan Khatter for a pivotal role.
Ishaan made his debut in Bollywood last year and he was praised for his performances in both Dhadak and Beyond the clouds.
title: After Vicky Kaushal's Uri, Ishaan Khatter To Star In A Film On Pulwama Attack, Claim Reports
